author: Hernan Horovitz
title: VIDEO: Vinicius Junior marca el segundo gol del Real Madrid vs Celta de Vigo por la Copa del Rey
text:
VIDEO: Vinicius Junior marca el segundo gol del Real Madrid vs Celta de Vigo por la Copa del Rey
- El Madrid gana por 2 a 0
- El primer gol lo habÃ­a anotado MbappÃ©, tras una gran jugada individual
Por Hernan Horovitz
Tras un primer tiempo complicado, en el el Real Madrid apenas se habÃ­a ido en ventaja gracias a una gran jugada individual de MbappÃ©, Vincius Junior ampliÃ³ la ventaja en el marcador con una precisa definiciÃ³n.
De esta manera, los merengues se imponen al Celta de Vigo por 2 a 0, en un partido correspondiente a la Copa del Rey.

author: world today news
title: RSU elections were missed at Rap, Uiltrasporti, FP Cgil and Fiadel: â€œThe company did not provide the lists of those entitled to voteâ€.
text:
Less than a week after the vote for the renewal of the unitary union representatives and for the safety of the environmental hygiene sector, the RAP has not yet provided the commission with the lists of those entitled to vote nor the electoral material, such as the lists presented by the trade unions . This was reported by , Uiltrasporti Fp Cgil Palermo and Fiadel, calling into question the most important and largest company in Sicily, Rap, a subsidiary company that manages the waste collection and sweeping service. The elections will take place on 3 and 4 December, the only date at national level for the renewal of trade union representatives in the sector.
â€œThe electoral commission was formed over a month ago, in compliance with the rules and timing and, despite countless requests and even a legal warning, the company did not deliver the essential electoral material to be able to carry out the elections â€“ they say Andrea Gattuso, general secretary of Fp Cgil Palermo, Raffaele Montuoro, regional secretary of Uiltrasporti and Giuseppe Badagliacca, general secretary of Fiadel Sicilia -. Electoral material which, however, the RAP sent exclusively to a Commission convened beforehand by a person appointed by Fit-Cisl, without title, as it lacked the necessary requirement of being the oldest member. A circumstance that cannot be denied.â€
FP Cgil, Uiltrasporti and Fiadel immediately contested the legitimacy of this Commission, convened in total conflict with the rules of the electoral regulations that all the trade union organizations signatory to the Ccnl, without exception, shared at a national level. The three organizations also invited the â€œdisputedâ€ Commission to participate jointly but to no avail. â€œWe consider Rapâ€™s attitude to be serious â€“ add Gattuso, Montuoro and Badagliacca -. In our opinion, the company did not behave impartially and thirdly on this matter, not transmitting the electoral material and consequently not recognizing the legitimately established electoral commission and instead choosing to regulate the one convened by the member appointed by Fit Cislâ€.
A â€œvexatiousâ€ attitude in contrast with what is happening elsewhere: throughout Italy and even in some Environmental Hygiene construction sites in the province of Palermo, trade union organizations and employer companies are, instead, adhering to the rules set out in the electoral regulations of 6 September 2024 and the procedures are moving forward with the utmost serenity and collaboration.
â€œThis situation â€“ continues the complaint from the trade union organizations â€“ is objectively preventing FP Cgil, Uiltrasporti and Fiadel-Cisal from being able to allow their candidates to participate in the elections for the RSU and Rlssa in the most important company in the hygiene sector environment of Palermo and Sicily. We firmly believe in democracy in the workplace and have promoted representation elections at all levels. We do not understand how the Fit-Cisl candidates can carry out the elections next week, competing only with an autonomous acronym, under the control and management of a commission, convened by those who had no qualifications, in a climate of absolute uncertainty and confusion on the part of part of the workersâ€.
If no concrete acts are received from the company to restore democracy and legitimacy, Fp Cgil Palermo, Uiltrasporti and Fiadel will undertake all appropriate legal action â€œin order to guarantee both the right of each trade union organization to nominate its own candidates and that of the workers to be able to legitimately vote for them.â€

author: Ryan Anderson
title: Giant Hail Pounds Central Texas, San Marcos Reels from Power Outages and Property Damage

author: 10 play
title: Strapped Down House In Florida Survives Hurricane Milton
text: Homeowner Pedro Casares of Orlando strapped down his family home to try and save it from Hurricane Milton as it made landfall as a Category 3 storm. Casares reportedly spent US$22,000 (AU$ 32,590) on the cement anchors and made-to-order straps that lined the roof of the home. In addition to the straps, the family also boarded up windows, The idea came to Casares after the family had endured a hurricane while living in Guaynabo, Puerto Rico, and the aluminium roof of their home almost flew off. Casaresâ€™ daughter took to TikTok to share the state of the house after the storm. [@simplyuniquesmiles93]We made it through our second Hurricane and we are blessed to have no crazy damages to rhe home. My prayers still continue to those heavily affected during this time. Me and my dad are about to drive to see if anyone needs helpðŸ™ðŸ¼ðŸ [#HurricaneMilton][#CentralFL][#Orlando][#FLhomegoesviral][#homestrappeddown][#homedepot][#lowes][#USCC][#cargocontrolstraps][#acehardware][#CNN][#wash2news][#spectrumnews][#telemundo][#univision][#dailymail][#abcnews][#ukradiostation][â™¬ Inspirational - neozilla] â€œThe house, thankfully, weâ€™re good. There are just a lot of leaves everywhere, but everything is still intact. Thereâ€™s a lot of affected areas near our home,â€ she said in the video. â€œThe home is intact. Not a single shingle nor tile has lifted from the roof. Everything is good. Weâ€™re not taking the straps off until the hurricane is over!â€ she added. Millions are still without power in Florida, while flooding still remind a threat along rivers in the area.

author: Thalya Godoy
title: VÃDEO: nem vira-latas perdem oportunidade e aproveitar caminhÃ£o-pipa para se refrescarem em calorÃ£o de MS
text: Porto Murtinho, a 438 km de [Campo Grande](https://midiamax.uol.com.br/municipios/campo-grande/), frequentemente aparece no ranking das cidades mais quentes do paÃ­s, especialmente durante as ondas de calor que tÃªm castigado Mato Grosso do Sul desde a primavera. De acordo com o [Inmet](https://midiamax.uol.com.br/tag/inmet/) (Instituto Nacional de Meteorologia), na Ãºltima quarta-feira (10), o municÃ­pio registrou a maior temperatura em todo paÃ­s, de 39,5ÂºC. Assim, diante do calorÃ£o, uma forma encontrada pela [Prefeitura de Porto Murtinho](https://midiamax.uol.com.br/tag/prefeitura-de-porto-murtinho/) para amenizar o calorÃ£o Ã© o uso de um caminhÃ£o-pipa para jogar Ã¡gua na rua. Contudo, quem chamou a atenÃ§Ã£o na cena foi uma dupla de cachorrinhos vira-latas que aproveitaram a Ã¡gua para brincar e se refrescarem. Nas imagens divulgadas nas redes sociais, os dois seguem o veÃ­culo enquanto se molham e pulam de um lado para o outro. Segundo o [Cemtec](https://midiamax.uol.com.br/tag/cemtec/) (Centro de Monitoramento do Tempo e do Clima), a previsÃ£o do tempo para Porto Murtinho, na sexta-feira (12), Ã© de mÃ¡xima de 34ÂºC. Arara se refresca em quartel Outro animal que chamou a atenÃ§Ã£o pela procura de Ã¡gua fresca em Mato Grosso do Sul, nesta semana, foi uma [arara-canindÃ© que abriu e fechou sozinha uma torneira](https://midiamax.uol.com.br/cotidiano/2024/video-esperta-e-educada-arara-caninde-abre-e-fecha-torneira-para-se-refrescar-em-quartel-da-pmms/) em um quartel em Campo Grande. O vÃ­deo divulgado nas redes sociais mostra a visitante especial empoleirada em um cano. Com a ajuda do bico, ela abre a torneira, dÃ¡ quatro goles e, em um ato de educaÃ§Ã£o, tenta fechar o registro, mas para o lado errado. Em seguida, a ararinha esperta gira a torneira para o lado correto e fecha o registro. A ave ainda â€œposouâ€ para fotos feitas pelos policiais militares e fez amizade ao pousar no cabo de um rodo que um agente segurava.

author: Taiwan News
title: Skies clear in much of Taiwan for New Year's Eve as cold front arrives | Taiwan News | 2023-12-29 13:54:00
text: TAIPEI (Taiwan News) â€” Skies in most of Taiwan will be clear for the fireworks on New Year's Eve and the sunrise on New Year's Day, but temperatures will drop as a cold front arrives. The Central Weather Administration (CWA) said due to the influence of a northeast monsoon on Friday (Dec. 29), the north will be cooler during the day, while other areas will be 24-27 C, with a chance of heavy rain in the northeast, reported [Liberty Times](https://news.ltn.com.tw/news/life/breakingnews/4535427?fbclid=IwAR2hDOT4HkTB7kbE7fpMxHGO2DbAPu7ad5gcOqvQs0r44SYsguwln0rKtm8). On Saturday (Dec. 30), temperatures will rise in the north and northeast, with localized showers in the north and east, with partly cloudy to sunny skies elsewhere. The CWA predicted cooler weather for the Greater Taipei area, the north coast of Keelung, and the east on New Year's Eve (Dec. 31). Brief localized rains are forecast in those areas and it is expected that from New Year's Eve to New Year's Day (Jan. 1), this wave of cold air will bring its coldest temperatures. On New Year's Day, the chances of seeing the first sunrise of 2024 are relatively high in Hsinchu and areas south, as well as Penghu, Kinmen, and Matsu. However, in Taoyuan, the Greater Taipei area, and the east, there will be slightly more cloud cover. The first light of the new year may only be sporadically visible through breaks in the clouds. From Dec. 31 to Jan. 1 morning, the north and northeast will likely reach 14 or 15 C, and other areas 16 to 18 C. The effects of the monsoon will continue to be felt from Jan. 1 to Tuesday (Jan. 2), and the weather in the north and northeast will be cooler. The northeast monsoon will weaken during the day on Tuesday and temperatures will rise slightly in the north and northeast as conditions become drier. Skies on Tuesday will be partly cloudy to sunny across the country, with only sporadic rainfall in the east. On Wednesday (Jan. 3), the northeast monsoon will strengthen again and the weather in the north and northeast will turn cooler again. This cooling trend will continue on Thursday (Jan. 4) with localized showers possible in the north and east, with partly cloudy to sunny skies expected in the west and south.
